tasks.prompt: Practice greetings and goodbyes with a partner at school.

scenario.summary: You meet your friend in the hallway. You greet each other, chat briefly, and say goodbye.

roles.name: Student 1
roles.goal: Greet Student 2 warmly and say goodbye politely.
roles.details: You are happy to see your friend and are on your way to class.

roles.name: Student 2
roles.goal: Respond to Student 1’s greeting and say goodbye.
roles.details: You are also happy to see your friend and are going to a different class.

steps: Student 1 greets Student 2 with a friendly phrase.
Student 2 responds to the greeting naturally.
They talk briefly about their plans for the day.
Student 1 says they have to leave for class.
Student 2 wishes Student 1 goodbye and good luck.

phrases.translation: A way to ask about someone’s well-being.
A polite response to ‘How are you?’
A way to ask about someone’s plans or activities.
A polite way to say you need to leave.
A friendly way to say goodbye.
A way to wish someone well when parting.
A friendly greeting when meeting someone.
A way to wish someone a pleasant day.
